Re: How We Get Brainwashed!




Quote:

""The Role of the Computer in Future Instructional Systems"" which was published as the March/April, 1963 supplement of Audiovisual Communication Review [Monograph 2] of the Technological Development Project of the National Education Association [Contract #SAE9073], U..S. Office of Education, Dept. of Health, Education and Welfare.) Excerpts from a chapter entitled ""Effortless Learning, Attitude Changing, and Training in Decision-Making"" follow: 
""Another area of potential development in computer applications is the attitude changing machine. Dr. Bertram Raven in the Psychology Department at the University of California at Los Angeles is in the process of building a computer-based device for changing attitudes. This device will work on the principle that students' attitudes can be changed effectively by using the Socratic method of asking an appropriate series of leading questions designed to right the balance between appropriate attitudes, and those deemed less acceptable. For instance, after first determining a student's constellation of attitudes through appropriate testing procedures, the machine would calculate which attitudes are 'out of phase' and which of these are amenable to change. 
""If the student were opposed to foreign trade, say, and a favorable disposition were sought for, the machine would select an appropriate series of statements and questions organized to right the imbalance in the student's attitudes. The machine, for instance, would have detected that the student liked President Kennedy and was against the spread of Communism; therefore, the student would be shown that JFK favored foreign trade and that foreign trade to underdeveloped countries helped to arrest the Communist infiltration of these governments. If the student's attitudes toward Kennedy and against Communism were sufficiently strong, Dr. Raven would hypothesize that a positive change in attitude toward foreign trade would be effectively brought about by showing the student the inconsistency of his views. There is considerable evidence that such techniques do effectively change attitudes. 
""Admittedly, training in decision-making skills is a legitimate goal of education in this age of automation, but the problem remains--does the educator know what values to attach to the different outcomes of these decisions?...What about students whose values are out of line with the acceptable values of democratic society? Should they be taught to conform to someone else's accepted judgment of proper values? Training in decision-making is ultimately compounded with training in value judgment and, as such, becomes a controversial subject that needs to be resolved by educators before the tools can be put to use.""




Quote:

Re: How We Get Brainwashed!




Quote:


Originally Posted by Dr. Ford


I was once told by a professor that there are two main categories of techniques the media uses to influence people. I don't recall if there are technical terms for each of them. 
The first way is the ""direct"" approach whereby the TV ""tells people what the heck to do"", e.g., ""don't do drugs"", ""eat your vegetables"", ""marry Negroes"", etc. This approach is not very effective.
The other, indirect, approach is to constantly provide examples of other people behaving in a certain way. e.g., Blacks and Whites marrying, every show having main characters that are opposed to ""racism"", Black or Mexicans that behave as though they are good members of society or even that act much like Whites (e.g., The Jeffersons). This latter approach has been shown to be very effective.
In his 2005 EURO speech, Nick Griffin (the chairman of the BNP) made similar observations about the WN movement. Griffin said that the vast majority of people cannot wake up from something they read. Instead, they have to see others behaving in a certain way before they can accept a new way of thinking or behaving.
It is perhaps a sad commentary on the mindset of the common man, but as Griffin said, ""There you are."", i.e., it is a fact we have to accept.
That said, thee are many, many people in our population who can be awoken by something they read or hear and we have to try to reach those first because we will need their help to get the numbers we'll need to implement the indirect approach (well, at least, outside of PLEs).


I couldn't agree more. People see things on t.v. and they accept them at face value. In today's modern age, it starts at a very young age as parents allow their children to sit for hours in front of the television. The child sees it on the t.v. and accepts it as a normal behavior. Then the child gets old enough to go to school, where they learn that having gay parents is fine, Martin Luther King is a hero to all people, and if your sister brings home a negro boyfriend, that's o.k. That trend continues all through a child's public school education. It becomes cyclic. Watch multi-cultural images on television, go to school and see multiculturalism in action, and then go home and repeat the whole process again. The only way I think to break the cycle is to pull your children out of public school and monitor their television watching habits very closely. In time, some people break free from the cycle and see the truth for what it is, however, that seems to be a rare thing.

Re: How We Get Brainwashed!


When the TV became the babysitter, the country went to crap. I say this with historical perspective. I remember in my youth there were only a few TV channels, excessive TV viewing was frowned on (my mom never let me watch it except for an hour or so a week), outdoor activities were encouraged, etc.
And then when women started working and TV became an obsession and a babysitter for others reasons as well, young minds began to think this thing was their parent and developed a very strong bond. And once that bond is there, you can tell kids anything and they are going to believe it. At least while they are young. And then you expect the colleges and higher education to break that bond and challenge them, but they stopped doing that.
It's a mess. But it's fixable. You can point to the Jew domination of the media and academe during this period as a major source of the problem. In my era, the colleges and schools and all that were still run by whites, and TV was directed at whites and normal or traditional values.

I tell you what signalled a descline in our society: it is those hats with the strip in the back that you adjust for your size. People under thirty probably don't remember, but hats used to come in sizes, like shoes. Then they came out with that adjustable hat.
You used to go into a clothing store and someone would measure your head and find you a hat. Now, we are so anti-social that we don't want to see or have to coverse with a saleman, and some can be pesky. With the adjustable hat, you didn't have to deal with the complications of different sizes, or be embarressed when someone asked your hat size and you didn't know. 
Also, the adjustable hat could be mass produced at lower cost since you didn't have to have tooling for different sizes. Or deal with third world factory workers who couldn't understand the math of hat sizes. The 'one size fits all' doctrine that squashes individuallity and relieves everyone of a small amount of thinking. 
I didn't originate this observation about the adjustable hat. I read it in a book about twenty years ago. I forget the name of the book. ""The X Personality"" or something.

You used to go into a clothing store and someone would measure your head and find you a hat. With the adjustable hat, you didn't have to deal with the complications of different sizes, or be embarressed when someone asked your hat size and you didn't know. 
Also, the adjustable hat could be mass produced at lower cost since you didn't have to have tooling for different sizes. Or deal with third world factory workers who couldn't understand the math of hat sizes. The 'one size fits all' doctrine that squashes individuallity and relieves everyone of a small amount of thinking. 
I didn't originate this observation about the adjustable hat. I read it in a book about twenty years ago. I forget the name of the book. ""The X Personality"" or something.


Of course, you have a point. But morte likely than not the fellow measuring your head to determine your hat size was a Jew even back then. When I was growing up, the small southern town that I live in had lots of stores, but they were mostly owned by Jews, even though there were hardly any Jews anywhere among the population. They probably amounted to less than 1% of the population in this county, yet they owned about 65%-70% of the stores. Weinsteins, Goldbergs, Engles, all of these were little one-off Jew owned stores in rural Alabama. 
Hats, at least what I would call dress-hats (hombergs, etc.) pretty much fell out of fashion in the 1960's. When I was young my grandfather and his brothers wore them, but my parents' generation (who were born in WWII) never wore dress hats, baseball caps, sure, but not hats. I think it had a lot to do with Kennedy, he was the first president that didn't go in for hats, and none after him really have either. And the decline of the United States really dates back to the Kennedy administration. He enabled a lot of the desegregation that was to take over the public schools and drag the standards of whites growing up then down to the level of the blacks that they were forced to go to school with. When races are forced together like that, the end result is that the standards will inevitably sink down to the level of the lowest common denominator.

Re: How We Get Brainwashed!


Disinformation agents use Internet Discussion Boards. The purpose is to attack information which could uncover little known facts which may alter the thinking of many who take part in the discussion, and eventually could lead to a change in the thought pattern of the general population.
One man has gone through the trouble of putting together 25 disinformation rules. I am giving a very short summary. Those who are interested can read the article in detail at http://www.loveforlife.com.au/node/3684 .
You may be able to recognize some of those rules being applied at this very board.Twenty-Five Most Common Rules of Disinformation
1. Hear no evil, see no evil, speak no evil. 2. Become incredulous and indignant. 3. Avoid discussing certain issues by describing all charges, regardless of venue or evidence, as mere rumors and wild accusations. 4. Use a straw man. 5. Sidetrack opponents with name calling and ridicule. 6. Hit and Run. 7. Question motives. 8. Invoke (usually your own) authority and simply say it isn't so without further explanation or citing sources. 9. Play Dumb (and I am adding here, play forgetful). 10. Associate opponent charges with old news. 11. Establish and rely upon fall-back positions. 12. Enigmas have no solution. 13. Alice in Wonderland Logic. 14. Demand complete solutions. 15. Fit the facts to alternate conclusions. 16. Vanish evidence and witnesses. 17. Change the subject. 18. Emotionalize, Antagonize, and Goad Opponents. 19. Ignore proof presented, demand impossible proofs. 20. False evidence. 21. Call a Grand Jury, Special Prosecutor, or other empowered investigative body. Subvert the (process) to your benefit and effectively neutralize all sensitive issues without open discussion. 22. Manufacture a new truth. 23. Create bigger distractions. 24. Silence critics. (This can be done to people who leave themselves open to public scrutiny, people who put up web-sites or who reveal their names and email addresses). 25. Vanish.

SMG


Somewhat against my better judgment, I'll go ahead and post this image of Sarah Michelle Gellar taken from another SF thread. I realize the observation I make below will be dismissed off-hand by most. (At least it'll bump this thread.)
What caught my attention was the difference in expressions in her left & right half faces. There is some evidence that the right and left sides of the body are controlled by separate mechanisms in our bodies/brains. That being so, while SMG normally has a symmetric face/smile, I interpret the above asymmetric smile as a manifestation of different personalities. I don't think I've seen this in a picture before (where the man/woman wasn't intentionally 'making a face'), other than the Mona Lisa, but others may have. I interpret two opposing emotions in her left and right sides of her face. Thus a personality fracture, and thus mind-control.
I realize this is speculative. But I've read that satanic families inflict mind-control techniques on their own children to keep them in line, too, so it's no big leap to think SMG was tortured as a child. She went into acting at an early age... (Torture-based learning is apparently very effective.) She comes from a jewish family... She wears a Christian cross...
Maybe it's just a freak picture and I'm seeing a mountain in a mole hill, but if not, she wouldn't be the first actress who was mind-controlled. (E.g. Marilyn Monroe)

Researchers have been able to study the personalities of unborn children and to watch how these personality traits stay with the children through their lives. In the Vol. 2 book it was explained how the Illuminati has used EEGs to determine the personalities of pre-verbal children so that they know what type of programming is best suited for that personality. Interestingly, on Mon., April 12, 96, 11 p.m. after the Vol. 2 book was out on the market, 20/20 did a show where they showed researchers using EEG electrodes to monitor childrens brainwaves for their happiness potential. It is known that brain potentials associated with voluntary movements have been identified, thereby giving big brother the potential to predict when a person is going to make a particular movement. The brain is dynamically looking at patterns and continuously generating hypotheses about its environment which are then validated or invalidated by information picked up by the senses. The P300 wave (known as the P3 wave for short) allows neuroscientists to track decision making in a brains cortex. The P300 wave shows when the minds thought processes have been internally surprised. In this way, detection of the P300 gives a method of lie-detection superior to the polygraph. When surprised the brain creates P300 wave by internal brain functions-- such as what chapt. 4 will call ""cognitive demon processes"". Initially, EEGs are taken of child victims, with an analysis of the different wave forms. Next, will come tests of VERs (visually evoked responses). This is valuable for instance, because bright children will show asymmetric (high amplitude) responses during VERs from the right hemisphere. Children with low I.Q. show the same evoked response from both hemispheres. This is just one window on the mind that the Illuminati programmers have of the preverbal children. There are other evoked-potential tests that are being used to determine personality traits too. Evoked-responses can also be used to show whether the person is conscious, or how deep they are in a coma. The early components of the evoked response, which occur 10-20 milliseconds after a stimulus, are believed to come from the brain stem and can be used to determine a level of a coma. Evoked-responses are also used to determine particular learning disabilities within a child. Right-handed children will show even prior to birth, an anatomical specialization that favors language acquisition in the left hemisphere. So they can even determine what handed-ness the child has very early on. (From page 19 of Deeper Insights into the Illuminati Formula by Fritz Springmeier & Cisco Wheeler)

Hi elysium,
I suppose this post is an interesting one to reference regarding women being contrary to men (""white satanic witches""), though my claim comes from observing things, overhearing things throughout my life. Some women seem to have some flavor of feminism as their top-most religion, despite whatever else they believe. It seems to me like it's a game with them. Not that all men are above this kind of treachery. And as I wrote before, it's not all women. If not for other experiences, I'd be tempted to say these women are selfish because of liberalism and consumerism, but because of various things I've seen and heard, I can't honestly conclude that it's merely individual action - (and this will probably get me labeled) it's organized to some degree.
1) There was an episode of Oprah where they were openly discussing how a husband was best directed (write things down for him, make a list) while the wife was free to invite her old boyfriend over despite his jealously. The female audience gave a light cheer and applause. Reverse that situation and imagine how this would be (rightfully) decried as oppressive.
2) There was a car commercial I saw twice, where a woman was featured showing off the automatic controls in the car, highlighted by her placing her hand on the cheek of her docile presumed boyfriend and lightly patting him as the announcer told how she had total control. Reverse that situation (with a man patting his blandly staring girlfriend) and we'd hear howls.
Those are two public examples of an undercurrent of female desire to control men. I'm not saying it's universal. I am saying it's not so uncommon and men need to watch for it. I'm not even saying it's not a natural human desire of some to dominate those around them. But how can you defend against an opponent you can't even talk about. Citing Gilligan's Island wisdom: It's the wolf you don't see that's the most dangerous.
I've seen enough and I'm determined enough to hold this belief despite contrary views. After I began to listen to spiritual feelings, I paid attention to tremblings I got from people. I was surprised at first at the number of women that gave me the creeps, sometimes from just the expression on their faces, but other times a strong creepy-crawly sensation as they passed behind me without me first noticing them. A few men. Mostly older women. And like I said, there are other things I won't divulge here that solidify my belief.
I have a deep respect for women who hold down one or more jobs and keep their family together and on a solid course. Even just going alone in the world can be a major feat. But that doesn't change the fact that a subset of women are hostile to men.
As for men being manly, I'd say it takes discipline, standards, and training. It would be wonderful if the husband and wife were both whole and well-adjusted when they married, but that's wishful thinking. Respect and love flow from core values, imho, and not from being ""a man."" Being self-actualized, loving, wise, strong, and productive, I believe, make ""a man"" though I don't know of anyone with all those qualities (including myself). I believe that those who repeatedly attempt to build their self-worth by tearing down others are only predators and unworthy to be called White.
I think part of staying ""broken"" comes from not knowing what is broken, making you unable to self-repair. I think a radio show could be valuable, if done well and by wise people. It'd have to be done by people unafraid of tackling heavy subjects (and I'm not talking about jewes). We ought to examine the dark things in the light so we, as a race, don't continue to stumble.

leucocyte	9/13/2008	7:04 PM	"


Re: How We Get Brainwashed!




Quote:


Originally Posted by Ajax


Three-four decades ago, when the messages were many times subtle and woven within what appeared to be what whites found humorous, the argument seems mean-spirited.
For instance, I like Green-Acres; there were actually many funny parodies/skits against the then prevailing counter-culture.


I watched all of that stuff as a kid, and never realized what was going on. Now, when I watch it, I pick up on subtle things I never noticed then.
Did you know that Pettycoat Junction had a masonic ritual scene in one episode?
The idea for The Beverly Hillbillies was based upon real life. There actually were hillbillies in West Virginia that got rich when oil was discovered on their property. And Elly Mae Clampet was for real. Donna Douglas acted that way in real life. 
These shows might have not been a deliberate attempt to brainwash. Mostly they were just distraction. The world was starting to come apart even in the sixties. There was Vietnam and drugs and the hippie movement. People escaped into a fantasy world of the jew's making.
Television in itself is damaging. It puts the brain into a sort of trance. The boundary between real and make believe becomes blurred. Instead of neighbors talking to each other, they watched television. 
Television contributed to isolation, lonelyness, anti-social behavior and a reduction in the exercise of intellect. I think one reason people today have trouble expressing themselves in words is because of television. There's a conversation going on, but the viewer isn't part of it. Did you ever try to talk to someone who was watching television? I used to try it as a kid, just as an experiment. People generally act very irritated when you do that. 
Also, when I was a kid, I noticed a certain 'glassy eyed' stare that people have when watching television. Their eyes don't move. I read about this years later. The eye is a dynamic instrument. It can't linger long on one view. The chemicals on the retinal deplete, and the view gets dim. So the eye shifts constantly from scene to scene. With a television, the eye doesn't have to shirt since the scene itself is constanly changing. The television viewer stares straight at the television without moving his eyes much. It's very unnatural. It's like the electron beam in the picture tube is scanning information directly into the brain.
Even if these old shows were without a deliberate attempt to brainwash, they still weren't good for society. They allowed an escape from our problems instead of trying to solves our problems. 
Still, they were of a higher quality than shows of today. Back then, even the jews seemed to have some moral fiber to them. Maybe they were just pretending to be moral so to be acceptable.

Television shows back in the 1950's and 1960's seem better to us now because Society back then would not have tollerated the kind of crap that passes for televised entertainment these days; but all of those seemingly wholesome shows were laying the groundwork for what was to follow. 
The Jewish grip on the media goes way back, before television, and even before motion pictures. Vaudeville was filled with Jews, and many of the Jewish actors and actresses who later appeared in early movies and television shows got their start in Vaudville. 
Vaudeville taught the Jews something significant, it taught them that they could capture an audience's attention, and that comedy could be used to subtly manipulate people's opinions on political issues. 
Behind all those folksy, wholesome, sitcoms of the '50's and '60's was the subtle message that White culture was laughable, that we shouldn't take ourselves too seriously, that we should loosen up, stop being so uptight. Conservatism was out-of-date, ""square"", and only old fuddy-duddies thought that way.

Quote:

How to Program an Unknowing Hypnotic Subject
Estabrooks estimated that ten hours of hypnosis would be enough to accomplish his basic intention. However, he recommended a ten-month regimen for candidates who were to be both personality split and highly trained. What he called candidates were not volunteers. His basic procedure (given in Hypnotism, p. 195) for creating the unknowing hypnoprogrammed subject began with a disguised induction. It then proceeded to suggested amnesia, sealing against hypnotic competition, and the giving of a posthypnotic suggestion for instant re-induction by cue:
1) Covertly identify a specimen of the 20% of persons who are genetic somnambulists and easily can go to an amnesic depth of trance. Induct by a disguised method.
2) While the subject is in trance, give a posthypnotic suggestion for him to become deeply hypnotized again whenever the hypnotist gives a certain cue (such as tugging the left ear lobe with the right hand).
3) Also, give a posthypnotic suggestion which will deny the subject any conscious knowledge of this hypnosis, or any subsequent one. That causes an artificial, selective amnesia for all hypnosis events.
4) Give a posthypnotic suggestion that nobody else can hypnotize this subject (called sealing).
5) Give a suggestion under hypnosis that the subject will act in trance just as if awake (called waking hypnosis).
Estabrooks also suggested the creation of hypnoprogrammed messengers to convey secret information. He called for hypnotic conditioning in individuals who risk capture (such as Air Force pilots) to reinforce resistance against enemy interrogation and brainwashing. And he experimented with murder caused by indirect suggestion.


The strange thing is that the treatment of homosexuals with hypnosis may produce more satisfactory results than those obtainable by other means. See http://www.pubmedcentral.nih.gov/art...?artid=1935956 .

The U.S. Army Experience Center at the Franklin Mills shopping mall in northeast Philadelphia has 60 personal computers loaded with military video games, 19 Xbox 360 video game controllers and a series of interactive screens describing military bases and career options in great detail.
Potential recruits can hang out on couches and listen to rock music that fills the space.
[...]
Jesse Hamilton, a former Army staff sergeant who served in Iraq in 2005 and 2006, said the use of video games glamorized war and misled potential recruits, calling it ""very deceiving and very far from realistic.""


A bad economy and the lure of video games is the hope of the US Army for gaining more personnel to fight its wars.http://www.reuters.com/article/domes...0090109?rpc=64

Re: How We Get Brainwashed!


Researchers Try to Cure Racism
Quote:

As the first African-American president in United States history takes office, researchers have shown that it may be possible to scientifically reduce racial bias.
After being trained to distinguish between similar black male faces, Caucasian test subjects showed greater racial tolerance on a test designed to to measure unconscious bias.
The results are still preliminary, have yet to be replicated, and the real-world effects of reducing bias in a controlled laboratory setting are not clear. But for all those caveats, the findings add to a growing body of research suggesting that science can battle racism.

Popular opinion is ultimately determined by the desires and wishes of an elite ``social set.'' That set is a
``powerful, socially superior, successful, rich urban social set [which] is fundamentally international throughout the Western Hemisphere and in many ways, London is its center. It counts among its membership the most influential people in the world, containing as it does the diplomatic sets, high finance, the upper circles of the army and navy, some princes of the church, the great newspaper proprietors, their wives, mothers, and daughters who wield the scepter of invitation. It is at once a great circle of talk and a real social set.''
[...]

It is not sufficient to rely on the whims of a ``super social set'' to manipulate the ``pictures in people's heads''; that job ``can only be managed by a specialized class'' which operates through ``intelligence bureaus.''

Re: How We Get Brainwashed!


I was digging back in time of possible records of psychological warfare from the distant past and not to my surprise Ghengis Khan, the Mongolian Turk used it. Seeing how he was related to the Mongolian tribes from which neo-Jewry also sprang, it is practically a given that the leaders of Jewry are heavily into psychological warfare as well.
Quote:

Ghengis Khan was -- and has remained -- justifiably quite infamous for his astute political use of psychological warfare. Khan's tactics were elementary but effective: he sent 5th columnists ahead of his advancing troops, who encouraged rumours and spread disinformation amongst the local people, convincing them of the invincibility of his army. The talk and rumours spread by the advance agents normally propagandised that Khan and his troops gave lenient treatment to those who surrendered but killed those who resisted. The tactics were undoubtedly successful, as Khan's armies conquered large areas of the world. http://www.geocities.com/cpa_blackto...opsychowar.htm


The holocaust disinformation rumours became facts, and there is no lenient treatment of those who don't believe every detail of the by Jews presented ""facts"".
More on this:
Quote:

According to Paul Linebarger in his book Psychological Warfare, Khan was widely known for leading hordes of savage horsemen across Russia and into Europe. While not totally unfounded, the Mongols' image of total, barbaric domination was greatly enhanced by Khan's use of PSYOP, deception, OPSEC, and targeting his adversaries' decision-making process. ""Agents of influence"" were sent in advance of his armies to do face-to-face PSYOP, telling of brutality and large numbers in the Mongol army. Khan also used deception to create the illusion of invincible numbers by using rapid troop maneuver, making his army look larger than it really was. He had a network of horsemen called ""arrow riders"" to communicate quickly with his commanders, and he targeted enemy messengers to prevent enemy commanders from communicating with each other. All these actions caused a weakness in their enemy's psyche, and the Mongols were feared wherever they went. If Genghis Kahn were alive today, he may have employed CNN's Peter Arnett instead of his agents of influence. He may have used Hollywood movie techniques to create propaganda films depicting the barbaric treatment enemies would face if they challenged the Mongols. He could have used satellite communications to talk with his commanders and electronic jamming to interfere with his enemies' communications. No matter what the technology, the effect would have been the same. Genghis Khan still would have controlled the information battlespace. http://www.airpower.maxwell.af.mil/a...cc/berger.html


Some call Ghengis Khan the real father of psychological warfare as in this article: http://www.idsa.in/publications/stra...l%20Narula.pdf
We know that Jewish Communism was heavily into psychological warfare also. 
As we have seen from the many previous posts, we are in no way immune. The warfare of our enemies is among us and a war is being waged against us. It is a war which is meant to take our will away from us and replace it with the will of the enemy. That we become the ""floor rags"" and ""scape goats"" of the enemies has been determined by them. It is not anything new, only the techniques of psychological warfare and the methods used have grown.

Quote:

Diligent use of the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) helps to cast light on the advances that have been made in controlling the way people think and act. In 1977, through an FOIA request, 16,000 pages of documents were found, held as part of the Agencys financial history. That is how much of this information has been pieced together. The FOIA allows the most humble citizen to demand the disclosure of documents, although inevitably some will be heavily censored or not released at all. MC 5 NB, xvi, xvii
Inevitably, however, it is an incomplete picture. Most of the important details were conveniently destroyed under orders of CIA Director Helms to conceal wrongdoing.

In Project Bluebird which goes back to the 1950s, the following questions were explored:
* Can we create by post-H [hypnotic] control an action contrary to an individuals basic moral principles?
* Can we in a matter of an hour, two hours, one day, etc., induce an H condition in an unwilling subject to such an extent that he will perform an act for our benefit?
* Could we seize a subject and in the space of an hour or two by post-H control have him crash an airplane, wreck a train, etc.?
* Can we by H and SI [sleep inducing] techniques force a subject to travel long distances, commit specified acts and return to us or bring documents or materials?
* Can we guarantee total amnesia under any and all conditions?
* Can we alter a persons personality?
* Can we devise a system for making unwilling subjects into willing agents and then transfer that control to untrained agency agents in the field by use of codes or identifying signs?
* How can sodium A or P or any other sleep inducing agent be best concealed in a normal item, such as candy, cigarettes, coffee, tea, beer, medicines?

I watched all of that stuff as a kid, and never realized what was going on. Now, when I watch it, I pick up on subtle things I never noticed then.
Did you know that Pettycoat Junction had a masonic ritual scene in one episode?
The idea for The Beverly Hillbillies was based upon real life. There actually were hillbillies in West Virginia that got rich when oil was discovered on their property. And Elly Mae Clampet was for real. Donna Douglas acted that way in real life. 
These shows might have not been a deliberate attempt to brainwash. Mostly they were just distraction. The world was starting to come apart even in the sixties. There was Vietnam and drugs and the hippie movement. People escaped into a fantasy world of the jew's making.
Television in itself is damaging. It puts the brain into a sort of trance. The boundary between real and make believe becomes blurred. Instead of neighbors talking to each other, they watched television. 
Television contributed to isolation, lonelyness, anti-social behavior and a reduction in the exercise of intellect. I think one reason people today have trouble expressing themselves in words is because of television. There's a conversation going on, but the viewer isn't part of it. Did you ever try to talk to someone who was watching television? I used to try it as a kid, just as an experiment. People generally act very irritated when you do that. 
Also, when I was a kid, I noticed a certain 'glassy eyed' stare that people have when watching television. Their eyes don't move. I read about this years later. The eye is a dynamic instrument. It can't linger long on one view. The chemicals on the retinal deplete, and the view gets dim. So the eye shifts constantly from scene to scene. With a television, the eye doesn't have to shirt since the scene itself is constanly changing. The television viewer stares straight at the television without moving his eyes much. It's very unnatural. It's like the electron beam in the picture tube is scanning information directly into the brain.
Even if these old shows were without a deliberate attempt to brainwash, they still weren't good for society. They allowed an escape from our problems instead of trying to solves our problems. 
Still, they were of a higher quality than shows of today. Back then, even the jews seemed to have some moral fiber to them. Maybe they were just pretending to be moral so to be acceptable.

Most people do not think of their televisions as weapons because they are regarded as members of the family in many households across the country. Television has been entrusted with the care of the youth of this nation as a baby sitter. For many people, it is the primary source of news, information and entertainment. After a hard day of life in America, many people come home tired and plop themselves down on the sofa or their favorite easy chair, reach for the remote, turn on the TV and put their mind on hold.
Think of the times you have observed young children or senior citizens motionless in front of the TV. They wear a vacant, glassy-eyed look on their faces because they are in a trance-like state. Although it is not consciously perceived, the picture projected on the TV screen is actually flickering. We do not see the flickering consciously, but subconsciously the repetitive pattern of the flickering image induces a hypnotic state of mind in those who are vulnerable to that form of psychological suggestion.
Read the rest here:http://proliberty.com/observer/20060218.htm

""Dollhouse""


Last night was the premier of Joss Whedon's newest television show, Dollhouse, where people are mind-controlled and programmed for covert missions. After their missions, they go to a lab where they recline in a chair and have the mission's memories wiped, and then prepared for the next task. There was even a scene where a new ""recruit"" was essentially being tortured on a lab table to begin her ""training.""
Joss Whedon has visited this theme before. In Buffy the Vampire Slayer, the vampire character Spike had a microchip implanted in his brain which caused pain to prevent him from attacking humans. And in Firefly/Serenity the character River Tam was a victim of a government-run mind-control program seemingly patterned after MK-Ultra.
Has anyone else seen these shows? What would you speculate the purpose of this theme is? Is Joss trying to wake us all up? Or is this a preparation and desensitization to rolling out this government program into full public light?

Re: ""Dollhouse""




Quote:


Originally Posted by Coldstar

Creating a fairy-tale cover for these things may be its purpose. It seems to me people like to have a publicly acceptable path to deal with /wild/ stories that come their way. Think of the various satanic child abuse stories that get waved off as children's imaginations. So now if a child or adult tells that they have memories of being someone else, being tortured, or doing unusual things, people now have a way to laugh at them by saying they are just recalling what was shown on TV. Children do sometimes lie. People do sometimes have strange dreams that may be driven by TV or a movie. So when true victims attempt to get help they are further isolated by those they approached for help... 
So, maybe.
I don't watch much TV myself, but enjoy a couple shows, one being Terminator: The Sarah Connor Chronicles, which aired the first show of the remaining season last night. Dollhouse followed, and I watched it because it was by Whedon.
Whedon seems to have a special interest in mind control, as it recurs in his series. Whether this makes him a minion of evil or he truly wants to shove a bit of truth in front of the TV-viewing public, I don't know. In his defense, I had my brain tweaked a couple times in Firefly where the characters deduce on seeming little evidence that another has done something they were trying to hide; it didn't seem a necessary conclusion to me (me being eager to give benefit of the doubt to people), but within the confines of the show it was obvious and correct. It made me admit to myself that I, as many people, shrug away things that are 'too hard' or 'too convoluted' to figure out, when in fact dealing with uncomfortable details and figuring them out sometimes reveals a scoundrel.
In Buffy, Whedon frequently had plot lines where those who did not know about Buffy and her calling as slayer would accept nice-sounding but wholly inadequate explanations for the vampires and other monsters that would occasionally show themselves to them. Kids on PCP, for example. The evil major, police chief, and one evil school principal all knew and worked to keep it hushed up. All things to laugh at, as the cover stories fell so short of explaining what people saw. Yet, the people in the show accepted kids on PCP rather than deal with the fact of vampires (in the show). Kinda like 9-11.
This does not put Whedon in the ""truther"" category, as he MAY have a role to inform the few who can hear while further making the willingly blind accountable for rejecting the facts. Yet, it makes for interesting conjecturing as he places TV versions of certainly real happenings in front of us. I intend to follow Dollhouse for a while to see where he goes with it.

I've been travelling the world for five months or so and was not exposed to daily media propaganda, which gave me time to think how we are brainwashed so I was glad to see this thread.
I'm English and for a long time I've been - I don't know how to describe it - disappointed, shocked, horrified? by the BBC and the way they push positive imagery of non whites in all their programming these days.
I think the first awakening was watching an episode of 'Doctor Who' about three years ago. It was set around the time of the Coronation of Queen Elizabeth the Second, in 1953. The scene featured a happy group of Londoners having a street party, and maybe I'm exaggerating things in my mind but I recall the camera lingering over the black family at the street party. 
I'm pretty sure that any black family showing their faces at a street party in 1953 would have been made aware that their presence was not wanted, but the BBC felt it necessary to include them, as if showing an all white scene was unacceptable. 
Since then I've noticed it's impossible to escape the propaganda. In Australia a friend had bought 'Ugly Betty' on DVD. I'd never watched it but he played a couple of episodes and I soon realised how subversive this TV show is.
Let's take a look at the main character, Ugly Betty, and her family. Hispanics with a father that arrived in the US illegally. A black 'creative director' and her troubled relationship with her estranged daughter. Homosexuality pervades the show, even the womanising editor in chief would appear to have a veneer of gayness.
The show is a comedy, so we all sit back, laugh, and let the propaganda sink in.
I rarely watch TV, but if what I've seen is representative of the output of British and American programming then what is there to say, and what is there to do?

I think The Titties are an effective motivator... or perhaps something else comforting like them, like MONEY (jobs, stocks, pay-offs, etc.) I think an amazing number of people form their opinions to protect their comforts.
Black & White choices - a simple example of where They provide a list of acceptable answers and suppress debate outside Their lines; no ""none of the above"" answers allowed.
Rule by Ridicule is a technique I perceived years ago.
Controlling access to information is one, but better than that, is when they give you the basic facts but train you to interpret it in Their chosen way. Churches do this a lot, read a Bible passage, and then tell you what it means - no discussions, please. So then truth is put before our eyes, but do we see it?
BS into the subconscious... also works to desensitize you to the offensive/erroneous subject matter - inter-racial dating/couples, for a prime example.

Other techniques, imho, are: pretending to listen while dismissing every argument, thus wearing you down thinking you must be wrong if you can't get Them to see your view; treating you as if you're demented and feigning that they love you anyway (love bombing); pretending their way is the real, true way and that your views are alien (ignoring you). This last one, especially, it seems to me, is witchcraft because They attempt to get you to accept a false view of things in the face of actuality. But these are all, basically, istm, variations of the carrot or the stick approach: accept Their view and They'll love you, or reject it and They'll cast you out, or worse. Throw in a little threat or two if you don't conform and They've got a near perfect formula.

Lengthy article, from 9-11 to Tim McVeigh to UFO's to mind control to denial to the CIA & secrecy to conspiracy to the power elite to psychology & education to mystery cults to psychopathic papal legates to the War On Terror to MK-ULTRA to suicide bombers to wondering what will happen next.
Quote:

""When I saw the face of the alleged Oklahoma Bomber, Timothy McVeigh, I knew I had seen that expression before. I couldn't quite place the memory until a few days later when I read a newspaper account that reported McVeigh as saying that the government had implanted a computer chip in his hip to track him! The bells rang and the lightbulb lighted and I remembered where I had seen that ""face"" before.
He was young, about 26 or 27, blond, blue-eyed, clean- cut, powerfully built and definitely suffering. His body- language said it all. The young man sitting across from me in my hypnotherapy consulting room was overwhelmed by terror. His eyes darted to the right and the left as though expecting a blow from any quarter, and he was coiled as tightly as an overwound clock spring. His story was not entirely unique, but the level to which it had affected him was profound, possibly the worst I had seen, and I knew he needed help NOW.
Several months ago I was contacted by the owner of a large book store in a nearby city. She frequently refers clients to me for hypnosis. Generally they are the run-of-the-mill New Agers desiring past-life regressions out of simple curiosity, but sometimes the situations are quite serious and troubling. Luke's case, (a pseudonym) was one of the latter.
Maggie, (pseudonym), the book store owner, sponsors and promotes many book signings, seminars and classes that are held in the reading room of her store and she had met Luke at one of these. She knew something was troubling him, but it was some time before he confided in her. Now, he was telling his story to me.
""The government is experimenting on me,"" he revealed in embarrassed anguish. ""I don't know why or how, but there are a lot of people in on this and they are trying to drive me crazy.""
""What makes you think the government is experimenting on you?"" I asked.
""I KNOW they are. They have my house bugged, my phone is tapped, they have some kind of thing planted in me to control my thoughts, and they have people everywhere watching me.""
""What kind of people are watching you, where are they, and how do you know this?""
""The people who live around me are part of the project. They have them planted everywhere -- at McDonalds, at the laundromat, in the stores, at the restaurant, where I work. They put drugs into my food to knock me out and then they come and take me and experiment on me. Then, when they put me back, I can hear the people next door discussing me."" He paused and looked at me pleadingly. ""I know you think I am crazy, but you have to believe me. Something REAL is happening to me. It is not just in my mind and I am not making it up. I sleep with a gun under my pillow because someday they are going to make a mistake and I am not going to be completely out when they come!""
And the story goes on. Luke's anguish, paranoia and utter terror were real and tangible. This kid really believed what he was saying. For a few moments I toyed with the thought that he really ought to be hospitalized immediately as a danger to himself and others, but, the thing is, I had heard this sort of thing before to one extent or another. [Note: Because of the nature of his problems and the possibility that he was, in fact, manifesting schizophrenia, I DID refer him to a local psychological unit for evaluation. Whether he went or not, I'll probably never know, but I knew that a case as severe as his was simply out of my range of expertise and ethical responsibility.]
Last year I met a young woman at a local gathering for people interested in Eastern Healing Techniques. She was a well-to-do stockbroker's wife, stylish and vivacious. But, she took me aside and told me that her life was crashing around her because she had gone out for a drink with one of her husband's co-workers and he had taken her out to a remote area and she couldn't remember what happened to her there. She was sure, from bits and pieces she could pull together in her head, that this guy was a government agent, he had been a Navy S.E.A.L., her phone was tapped, they were watching her, and she was the subject of some kind of government experiment. She was distraught to the point of being unable to function. Her marriage was falling apart, her children were virtually abandoned by her efforts to find out what was going on in her life, and she was on the brittle edge of a breakdown.
In recent months I have talked to a dozen or more people who whisper to me about ""white vans, death camps,"" the ""Protocols of the Elders of Zion"" and the institution of martial law. They seem to be roughly divided into two groups: those who are involved in metaphysics and UFO phenomena and those who are not. The former group tend to talk about conspiracy in terms of ""UFO cover-up"" and captured ""alien technology"" which is going to be used by the Industrial-Military Complex to control us and then institute a One World Government. The latter group, resurrecting the frightening specter of pre-Nazi thought and philosophy, interprets the conspiracy as an event or series of historical events, leading up to this moment in time wherein the groundwork is being laid for the dreaded ""New World Order."" They blame it on the Jews, the Blacks, the Masons, the Templars, and assorted other ""secret societies"" which have infiltrated and control the government.""




Quote:

There is a little known fact about hypnosis that is illustrated by the following story:
A subject was told under hypnosis that when he was awakened he would be unable to see a third man in the room who, it was suggested to him, would have become invisible. All the ""proper"" suggestions to make this ""true"" were given, such as ""you will NOT see so- and-so"" etc... When the subject was awakened, lo and behold! the suggestions did NOT work.
Why? Because they went against his belief system. He did NOT believe that a person could become invisible.
So, another trial was made. The subject was hypnotized again and was told that the third man was leaving the room... that he had been called away on urgent business, and the scene of him getting on his coat and hat was described... the door was opened and shut to provide ""sound effects,"" and then the subject was brought out of the trance.
Guess what happened?
He was UNABLE TO SEE the Third Man.
Why? Because his perceptions were modified according to his beliefs. Certain ""censors"" in his brain were activated in a manner that was acceptable to his ego survival instincts.
The ways and means that we ensure survival of the ego are established pretty early in life by our parental and societal programming. This conditioning determines what IS or is NOT possible; what we are ""allowed"" to believe in order to be accepted. We learn this first by learning what pleases our parents and then later we modify our belief based on what pleases our society - our peers - to believe.




Quote:

And so it is with nearly all human beings: we believe the hypnotist - the ""official culture"" - and we are able, with preternatural cunning, to deny what is often right in front of our faces. And in the case of the hypnosis subject, he is entirely at the mercy of the ""Invisible Man"" because he chooses not to see him.
Let's face it: we are all taught to avoid uncomfortable realities. Human beings - faced with unpleasant truths about themselves or their reality - react like alcoholics who refuse to admit their condition, or the cuckolded husband who is the ""last to know,"" or the wife who does not notice that her husband is abusing her daughter.




Quote:

And maintaining the ""status quo"" in science HAS to be one of the main objectives of the Power Elite.
And how do they do that? By ""Official Culture.""
And official culture, understood this way, from the perspective of elite groups wishing to maintain the status quo of their power, means only one thing: COINTELPRO. And here we do not mean the specific F.B.I. program, but the concept of the program, and the likelihood that this has been the mode of controlling human beings for possibly millennia. Certainly, Machiavelli outlined the principles a very long time ago and little has changed since.
The fact is, I like to call it ""Cosmic COINTELPRO"" to suggest that it is almost a mechanical system that operates based on the psychological nature of human beings, most of whom LIKE to live in denial. After all, ""if ignorance is bliss, 'tis folly to be wise."" This is most especially true when we consider the survival instinct of the ego. If the official culture says that there is no Third Man in the room, and if it works through the inculcated belief systems, there is little possibility that the ""subject"" will be able to see the source of the phenomena in our world. It will always be an ""invisible Third Man.""
Usually, when we think of COINTELPRO, we think of the most well known and typical activities which include sending anonymous or fictitious letters - which are sometimes later withdrawn with an ""apology"" after they have already accomplished the goal of destruction; publishing false defamatory or threatening information; forging signatures on fake documents; introducing disruptive and subversive members into organizations to destroy them from within, and so on. Blackmailing insiders in any group to force them to spread false rumors, or to foment factionalism is also common.


Much more at link.

Mind Control & Secret Societies
Researcher Rayelan Allan discussed her unusual and personal experiences in such areas as covert government programs, mind control, and secret societies like Knights Templar. At one point in her life she began to hear voices, and initially thought she had been chosen to receive New Age-style channeled messages. Later, she found out from her husband, a Naval Officer in the CIA, that what she was actually hearing was ""voice to skull"" technology, developed as part of the government's electronic warfare program. For more on this kind of mind control, see the article Operation Open Eyes.
Allan discussed her marriage to Gunther Russbacher, the October Surprise Pilot, who she said became a political prisoner. During a trip to Austria, he revealed to her that he was one of the Knights Templar, along with details about the treasures the Templars recovered from King Solomon's Temple. It turns out that material from some of the recovered ancient manuscripts had been transmitted to her via the voice to skull technology, she said.
Allan writes about her trip to Mars in her book The Obergon Chronicles. She claimed she was taken there by Russbacher's Naval boss aboard a circular metallic craft, along with eleven other women. She described seeing the ""crystal people"" at Martian ruins, and an underground facility that contained a portal to Earth.

I don't understand how it happened, there's no middle area in my family, but since we don't believe all the BS and lies and aren't 'progressive' enough, my family is the black sheep.
You get brainwashed from parents, primary school, television, secondary school, college, and your brainwashed friends, as well as other media. It needs to end.

Re: How We Get Brainwashed!




Web page recalls the CIA's LSD Project which included the administering of LSD and other drugs to unwitting human subjects.
The project was code-named MKULTRA.
Quote:

(It) was the brainchild of CIA Director Allen Dulles, who was intrigued by reports of mind-control techniques allegedly conducted by Soviet, Chinese and North Korean agents on U.S. prisoners of war during the Korean War. The CIA wanted to use similar techniques on its own POWs and perhaps use LSD or other mind-bending substances on foreign leaders, including Cuba's Fidel Castro a few years after the project got underway in 1953.

Talking with Jews (or not)
Kevin MacDonald
February 10, 2009http://www.theoccidentalobserver.net...nald-talk.html
Quote:

A topic that is not discussed enough is the screaming, in-your-face, hostile aggression that people must withstand when they dare to trample on Jewish sensibilities. We are not talking about the sophisticated rationalization one sees in the op-ed pages of the mainstream media, or even the smear techniques of organizations like the ADL or the SPLC. We are talking about interpersonal aggression. There is something absolutely primal about it. 
Now comes a refreshingly frank blog post by Karin Friedemann, an ethnically Jewish anti-Zionist. She notes the “violent intolerance” that defenders of Israel show towards people with different opinions. 
Quote:

American Jews are actually being trained since childhood to interact with non-Jews in a deceitful and arrogant manner, in coordination with each other, to emotionally destroy Gentiles and Israel critics in addition to wrecking their careers and interfering with their social relationships. This is actually deliberate, wicked, planned behavior motivated by a narcissistic self-righteous fury…. 
The problem is that Gentiles are taught through emotional pressure and violence via the media and the school system to be very sensitive to Jewish suffering so when a Zionist becomes outraged at them for challenging their world view, the Gentile really has to fight against his own inner self in a huge battle against his ""inner Jew"" making him feel inadequate and intimidated. But the Jew doesn’t care how much he or she hurts others. Jews only care about what's good for the Jews. … 
If you mention cutting off the money or if you mention the possible compromise of living with Palestinians as equals in one state they become very angry and start using bullying tactics, unless they have some reason to fear you, in which case they shun you and complain about you to the authorities, try to get you arrested or try and destroy your career or social status through character assassination. … 
Zionists all believe in the myth of ""1000 years of Jewish suffering"" and feel that the world owes them compensation for their ancestors' ""unique"" suffering. It's a criminally insane viewpoint. They cope with the contradictions between their belief that they are the good guys and what Jews are actually doing to their neighbors, both in the Middle East and in the US, by developing mental health issues. Most Zionists are functional schizophrenics.


My take: 
· These tactics are not restricted to critics of Zionism.


Please read the whole of Kevin MacDonald's fine article.
As he writes, vociferous defense of some idea is not unique to Zionists. I've seen it used by non-jews for one's own selfish reasons - really, just dressed up thuggery. The belief I once had, that someone who was so passionate and certain-sounding of their stated beliefs MUST be honest about them, is dead. I see them as criminally-minded BSers now. Do they do it for fun, or just to gain leverage over you?
Giving in to their demanded idea may or may not be a wise strategy because of the threatened violence inherent in their tactic, but is avoiding them a better response? They ARE essentially liars.
I see this as a good example of mind control because of how I've seen it used over the years. Few will dare to challenge someone who violently claims the moral high ground; only those who know that person lies will be able to take them down - at the risk of a fight. So these people tend to get away with spreading their lies, imho. People may defend them as merely being ""passionate."" Yet I've not seen anyone who passed off aggressive lying (or advancement of their ideas) as passion who didn't turn out to be destructive to themselves and others.
EDIT: I feel I ought to add this additional thought: I've seen a few of those who use an urgent, serious tone when pushing their agenda/lie, when met with a unbelieving look from their intended victim (me), involuntarily show a quick smile or even a slight laugh, and then return to their original tone. Obvious deception. I think it intends to leverage the otherwise amiable and cordial friendship/relationship; as in ""believe my lie as a favor because were friends."" But then I have no real knowledge of psychology, so others may better dissect this interaction.
Whatever its basis, I recall how Bush Jr., when speaking to a dinner audience about the war in Iraq, said with a smile that despite none being found there had to be weapons of mass destruction over there somewhere, and how the elite audience laughed. Yet in 'normal' life, the WMD lie was told with all seriousness. Does knowing that they don't believe their own lie help us ""buy into"" it? Like it's only a game and we're supposed to play along?

Protecting our Children in a World Gone Mad


Protecting our Children in a World Gone Mad
Karin Friedemann - 1 November 2009
""When I spent a year teaching 6-8 grade students in Detroit, Michigan, I had hoped that with my high ideals, I could influence the children to become thinking citizens, perhaps even sway them towards a Godly life. But I found a tragic situation. American children of today are seriously brain damaged from computer games, TV, movies and pop music.
They have an attention span no longer than a commercial and if something is not flashing lights and making bleeping noises they have no interest in it. They have a huge problem translating their thoughts into written words and they have a hard time sitting still. They really requireand wantadults to manage their behaviour.   Concerning sex education, it was painfully clear that there was nothing I could do for these kids, except maybe an occasional isolated miracle. How do you convince a girl not to date boys when her own mother goes out on dates? You and I know that she is too young to think about such things, but the fact is, by 6th grade these childrens minds are set into the pattern created by the mass media. It made me realise that you really have to focus on protecting your kids from a very young age and arm them with knowledge.""
Have television and video games done an ultimate mind-f*** on our young?

There are two different issues here: The use of technology within the schools and the development and use of technology in society at large. I'll comment only on the former here.
Although technology has advanced a lot in the last century, the human animal has not. And so it stands to reason that the same educational techniques that worked a century ago should work today. After all, space exploration, computers, etc., were all developed by people who had been educated using traditional methods.
To discard these traditional and time tested methods wholesale and replace books with computers, etc., is ill advised without careful testing and long term (50 year+) evaluation. Of course, as we all know, the heavy use of computers, etc., in the classroom is just another of the latest educational gimmicks that promise to ""close the racial gap"", improve test scores, etc., by covertly dumbing down the entire population.
Those 6th grade Detroit students may be ""brain damaged"" alright, but is this not to be expected from birth for a population that has an average IQ in the mid 80's?

Assaulting the sexuality of a mentally and emotionally developing child seems so diabolically effective at being able to later manipulate the adult with sex, that it seems obvious. That facet, confirmed in other places, shows the satanic fabric behind child exploitation, and ultimately, all mass brainwashing. That satanic rituals allegedly draw energy from sexual child sacrifice just shows how important they view the energy contained therein. That the adults who abuse the children are also open to blackmail is just a side benefit. I also think a little obvious perversion may hide a lot of it. If sexual deviants dont care how they fulfill their lusts, would they balk at using a victimized child?
If sexual acts draw or manipulate some spiritual energy, molding public perception to accept the heretofore unacceptable makes more satanic sense. Blinding the public to sexual deviancy and also child sexual exploitation means wholesomeness can be tossed in the trash bin with yesterdays leftovers and dumped by those wishing to further the depravity. Even some of the UK child victims (as the BBC article said) were brainwashed somehow to believe what was being done to them was normal. As I believe Ive written here before, the abusers act like everything is normal. Isnt that what all child abusers say to the children: Everybody does it, but we dont talk about it? It seems to me not talking about something so important as sex  in a healthy way  plays right into the hands of the abusers. Of course, the satanic response to this is to drag every vile and raunchy sex story onto prime time television shows. How easy it must be for evil people to control public discourse when abuse of free speech is tolerated? So now come the labels prude and liberated.
Its sad how little phrases can be used to improperly describe a situation and then used to direct what people think about it. Its just like the word anti-Semitic has become the magical phrase used to stifle all criticism of jewish crimes and misdemeanors. Some jews did some crime, some non-jew criticizes them, then one of their number yelps anti-Semitic. Blacks have used the word racism in the same way. Im sure you know this.
I think the job is for morally healthy people to be on the lookout for these things, and to not be diverted by trite explanations. Go to the core of the matter, not the cover story. I think its difficult to accept that some people are so wicked. I think damaged people are unable to function as they should which allows the wicked to roam freely. Its like a war without killing in that the wicked damage their opponents as children to cobble them.
Those who party on despite where theyre heading are moral trash and perhaps suited for where theyre being taken. We who pay attention and care that were being taken to hell in a hand basket need to jump ship and fend for ourselves. I think the spiritual truth is that many partiers know where theyre going and want us to ride with them, saying, Oh, everything will work out in the end. (Yeah, after someone pulls rank and turns the ship around.) I think the wicked will pull every trick in the book to make you go along with their plan; not that they themselves do what they say.
So, I guess, one definition of brainwashed could be being blind to God; being blind to truth, might be another. I think it all has to do with being evil and needing spiritual redemption. What do you think?

A Montreal woman is seeking to launch a class-action lawsuit more than 50 years after she says she was subjected to controversial psychiatric treatments funded by the Canadian government and the CIA.
Janine Huard, 78, was a patient at McGill University's Allan Memorial Institute when a doctor there was conducting brainwashing experiments.
Some former patients have been paid compensation by the federal government, and Huard says she should also be paid.
When Huard was in her early thirties, she had her fourth baby, and subsequently suffered from post-partum depression.
She was treated at the Allan Memorial Institute. But, she claims, the treatment made her depression worse than anything she could imagine.
""I had massive convulsive electroshocks, and they used to give me pills, 40 pills a day,"" she told CBC News on Monday.
Huard doesn't know if some of those were LSD pills, one of the experimental drugs being used in the hospital at the time.
But, she said, she does know she was sleep deprived for days, and forced to listen to recorded messages played over and over again.

Re: How We Get Brainwashed!


Ah this is something of a 'hobby-horse' of mine. 
What you basically have to understand is that the brainwashing is not really a presses of taking out someone’s brain then replacing it with one of your choice, so they think act and feel like a robot. It is much more complex and subtle than that. 
I suggest everyone goes and reads George Orwell's nighnteen-eighty-four at least 5 times, honestly its that good and took me at least that long to 'get it'. 
Perhaps the phrase brain washing itself is the problem, I myself prefer to say mind-control although that again isn't perfect. 
You see one thing we are all in control of is our own minds, except for perhaps the mentally ill. 
So when people act like they 'believe' all the blatant B.S the system is telling them, for the most part its a totally logical decision they themselves have made, consciously or subconsciously. 
This revelation completely changed my outlook and really aided me in seeing the bigger picture. 
This is why I have little time for people who want to to 'get the truth out' and 'educate our people'. The fact is that we are not trying to get people to 'see the truth' we are trying to persuade them to support the truth. 
Lets face it at the minute supporting the truth is a pretty 'stupid' thing to do for the average person, is it not? The instinct for personal survival dictates much of our lives and to convince someone to go against it is the greatest task you will ever face. 
So I think we must understand that what these people are suffering from, what as been called Stockholm syndrome. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stockholm_syndrome
Quote:

In psychology, the Stockholm syndrome is a term used to describe a paradoxical psychological phenomenon wherein hostages express adulation and have positive feelings towards their captors that appear irrational in light of the danger or risk endured by the victims.
The following are viewed as the conditions necessary for the stockholm syndrome to occur.Hostages who develop stockholm syndrome often view the perpetrator as giving life by simply not taking it. In this sense, the captor becomes the person in control of the captive’s basic needs for survival and the victim’s life itself. [1]
The hostage endures isolation from other people and has only the captor’s perspective available. Perpetrators routinely keep information about the outside world’s response to their actions from captives to keep them totally dependent.[1]
The hostage taker threatens to kill the victim and gives the perception as having the capability to do so. The captive judges it safer to align with the perpetrator, endure the hardship of captivity, and comply with the captor than to resist and face murder. [1]
The captive sees the perpetrator as showing some degree of kindness. Kindness serves as the cornerstone of Stockholm syndrome; the condition will not develop unless the captor exhibits it in some form toward the hostage. However, captives often misinterpret a lack of abuse as kindness and may develop feelings of appreciation for this perceived benevolence. If the captor is purely evil and abusive, the hostage will respond with hatred. But, if perpetrators show some kindness, victims will submerge the anger they feel in response to the terror and concentrate on the captors’ “good side” to protect themselves.[1]
In cases where Stockholm syndrome has occurred, the captive is in a situation where the captor has stripped nearly all forms of independence and gained control of the victim’s life, as well as basic needs for survival. Some experts say that the hostage regresses to, perhaps, a state of infancy; the captive must cry for food, remain silent, and exist in an extreme state of dependence. In contrast, the perpetrator serves as a mother ﬁgure protecting her child from a threatening outside world, including law enforcement’s deadly weapons. The victim then begins a struggle for survival, both relying on and identifying with the captor. Possibly, hostages’ motivation to live outweighs their impulse to hate the person who created their dilemma.


 Sound familiar....................

Re: How We Get Brainwashed!

I think we can all agree that reality is truth.
Whenever the truth is being bent, reality is being manipulated. Truth still exists, but it is distorted and planted into our minds as pure reality by the manipulators who serve powerful interests.
By indoctrination through constant repetition and the promotion of ""groupthink"" every social outlet empowers conformity to a bent reality.
This has over time created a widespread mythical system of absolute deception, and this absolute deception is being perceived as truth and reality.
Governments who work for the powerful interests know that the more reality and truth prevails in us, the less cooperative we become when falsehood is in the interest of the powerful but not in ours. At that moment we become trouble to them, possibly big trouble. Our conformity with truth does not serve their interests. Therefore, as far as they are concerned, we cannot handle the truth.
The people who run our social institutions are themselves victims of a false perception which they believe to be truth. They are teaching us myths as truth since early childhood since they themselves were indoctrinated when they were still young and don't know any better. Therewith they serve the interests of tyrants while they are under the deception that they are free. The process of stopping the exploitation of his innocent children by an alert parent is virtually impossible since the ""correctness"" of the established authority may not be challenged or even questioned!

torture is a tool 'brainwashers' use to brainwash their adherents and any others they wish to use/abuse. here's an interesting link i found yesterday re waterboarding. it is only a short hop from that to circumcision. think about it... think about it in relation to what we do to children in the USA in hospitals... devastatingly similar. they are strapped down and made to feel very frightened and powerless. that kind of treatment results in PTSD for many children in the USA who then become adults who dare not question authority - and conversely, who rail against authority. rage / withdrawal - the particular reaction depends on that person's proclivities. 
children being circumcised think they are being killed. i heard one man who had recurring dreams that he was on a conveyer belt with wild animals bending over him, eating him alive. i never thought i'd make it to age 12... wasn't until i put this all together that i understood why. i felt that my life was always in jeopardy... someone could come and 'get' me and hurt me in awful ways that i was powerless to resist, powerless to prevent. powerlessness > trauma > PTSD
this is all just a replay of what DID happen to us as children. put this together with what we do to children: http://www.truthout.org/waterboardin...o-reveals57372
""Waterboarding consists of immobilizing an individual and pouring water over their face to simulate drowning."" It elicits a gag reflex in the victim, ""making the subject believe his or her death is imminent."" The document noted that when waterboarding is ""poorly executed,"" it ""can cause extreme pain and damage,"" including broken bones from pulling against restraints. As a result, and in line with risks associated with other SERE techniques, at SERE school both medical and psychological monitoring is considered vital to protect students from injury. Dr. Percival indicated that JPRA did not support use of waterboarding in SERE training, as it ""does not teach resilience or resistance,"" and ""risks promoting learned helplessness."" 
Area of Concern: The JPRA official stance is that the water board should not be used as a physical pressure during Level C SERE training. This position is based on factors that have the potential to affect not only students but also the whole DoD SERE program. The way the water board is most often employed, it leaves students psychologically defeated with no ability to resist under pressure. Once a student is taught that they can be beaten, and there is no way to resist, it is difficult to develop psychological hardiness... 
Forcing answers under the extreme duress of the water board does not teach resistance or resilience, but teaches that you can be beaten. When a student's ability to develop psychological resiliency is compromised... it may create unintended consequences regarding their perception of survivability during a real world SERE event...
The Navy SERE school in Brunswick, Maine, discontinued the use of waterboarding in its training curriculum after a SERE psychologist found via ""empirical medical data ... elevated levels of cortisol in the brain stem caused by stress levels incurred during water boarding."" Cortisol*is a stress hormone released by the adrenal glands as part of the body's fight-or-flight mechanisms. Excess cortisol can lead to chronic stress, impaired cognitive abilities, thyroid problems, suppressed immune functioning, high blood pressure, and other health problems. 
[similar research points to similar physiological reactions during circumcision. http://www.cirp.org/library/pain/gunnar/ - it doesn't take a brain surgeon to realize that this is what circumcision teaches as well.]
Dr. Percival and Dr. J. Bruce Jessen, described learned helplessness:
When students feel they are faced with unsolvable problems, their performance and retention are significantly reduced. Training models that induce learned helplessness are worse than no training at all.
According to the American Heritage Medical Dictionary, learned helplessness (LH) is ""A laboratory model of depression in which exposure to a series of unforeseen adverse situations gives rise to a sense of helplessness or an inability to cope with or devise ways to escape such situations, even when escape is possible.""
The original experiments on LH, performed by former psychologist and former American Psychological Association president Martin Seligman, in the mid-1960s, and published in the Journal of Experimental Psychology with Steven Maier as ""Failure to Escape Traumatic Shock,"" exposed dogs to a situation where they were faced with inescapable electrical shocks. Within a short period of times, the dogs could not be induced to escape the situation, even when provided with a previously taught escape route. Drs. Seligman and Maier theorized that the dogs had ""learned"" their condition was helpless. The experimental model was extended to a human model for the induction of clinical depression and other psychological conditions.""
learned helplessness via torture is a tool they use in MKULTRA, a CIA mind-control project.

THE WORLD WAR 2 TOP SECRET BRITISH BLACK PROPAGANDA OPERATION.

Wikipedia definition of BP
Quote:

Black propaganda is false information and material that purports to be from a source on one side of a conflict, but is actually from the opposing side. It is typically used to vilify, embarrass or misrepresent the enemy.[1]
Black propaganda contrasts with grey propaganda, the source of which is not identified, and white propaganda (or White PR) in which the real source is declared and usually more accurate information is given, if also slanted or distorted.
Black propaganda purports to emanate from a source other than the true source. This type of propaganda is associated with covert psychological operations.[2]Another description of black propaganda is that the source is concealed or credited to a false authority and spreads lies, fabrications, and deceptions. Black propaganda is the ""big lie,"" including all types of creative deceit.[3]
Ultimately, black propaganda relies on the willingness of the receiver to accept the credibility of the source. If the creators, or the senders, of the black propaganda message does no adequately understand their receptive audience the message could be misunderstood, seem suspicious, or fail altogether.[3]


http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_propaganda
